#summary Setup for sip2sip.info
#labels sip2sip.info

To have an overview of configuration you should first look at the [Quick_Start Quick Start Guide]. <br />

 * From the home screen, click on the Options item([http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/imsdroid/res/drawable/options_48.png]) then Identity ([http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/imsdroid/res/drawable/identity_48.png]) and configure the screen as shown below:
<table>
<tr><td>[http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/sip2sip.info/screen_identity.png]</td></tr>
<tr align="center"><td>*Identity Screen*</td></tr>
</table>
Of course you should replace '2233392625' with your own user name and don't forget to enter your password. <br />

 * From the home screen, click on the Options item([http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/imsdroid/res/drawable/options_48.png]) then Network ([http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/imsdroid/res/drawable/network_48.png]) and configure the screen as shown below:
<table>
<tr><td>[http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/sip2sip.info/screen_network.png]</td></tr>
<tr align="center"><td>*Network Screen*</td></tr>
</table>
You should check *"Enable 3G/2.5"* if you are using 3G (e.g. UMTS) or 2.5 (e.g. EDGE) networks.<br />

 * Returns to the home screen and click on the "Sign In" item ([http://imsdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/imsdroid/res/drawable/sign_in_48.png]) to register. <br />
